rules_text: [i]Frontier[/i] – Whenever Impavid Trailblazer enters or attacks, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, discover 4. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
